summary: I PURCHASED A 2002 VW JETTA 1.8T DURING THE SUMMER, 2002. I HAVE RECENTLY BEEN MADE AWARE OF A SAFETY-RELATED DEFECT WITH THE IGNITION COILS THAT VW IS FAILING TO DO A RECALL TO REPAIR. WHILE MY UNDERSTANDING IS THAT VW CLAIMS THAT THIS IS NOT A SAFETY ISSUE, I AM AWARE OF PUBLICIZED AUTO OCCURRENCES THAT POINT TO A SERIOUS SAFETY ISSUE IF THIS IS NOT REPAIRED. A RECALL IS ESSENTIAL IN ORDER TO REPAIR THIS AND CORRECT THIS PROBLEM ASAP.
